text: A statutory trust shall be dissolved only by:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 801 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 29-1208.01

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: An administrative dissolution under §§ 29-106.01 and 29-106.02; or
The filing of articles of dissolution under § 29-1208.02:
On the occurrence of an event or circumstance that the governing instrument states causes dissolution; or
With the approval of all the beneficial owners.
